entries.journal_entry_description: You have a crystal, but it is not imbued with the force. It reacts well to you, so you can put your own essence into it and make it your own.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Feel the warmth of your crystal. While the crystals here are not sufficient to power a lightsaber, you can infuse it using your own connection to the Force. Find a place that is safe and meditate on the crystal.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Feel the warmth of your crystal. While the crystals here are not sufficient to power a lightsaber, you can infuse it using your own connection to the Force. Find a place that is safe and meditate on the crystal.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Concentrate on your crystal and channel the Force into it.
